name: Change_Type
description: An indicator showing if the payment record is New, Added, Changed, or Unchanged in the current publication compared to the previous publication.

name: NEW
description: - To identify “new” records added from the end of the
sample_data: previous submission deadline until the current submission period deadline

name: ADDED
description: - To identify records that were not eligible at the time of previous publication, which is eligible for current publication.

name: CHANGED
description: - To identify previously published records modified after the last publication.

name: UNCHANGED
description: - To identify previously published records that remain “unchanged” in current publication.  NEW  VARCHAR 2(20) string  20

name: Related_Product_Indicator
description: The indicator allows the applicable manufacturer or applicable GPO to select whether the payment or other transfer of value is related to one or more product(s) (drugs, devices, biologicals, or medical supplies). If the payment was not made in relation to a product, select "No". If the payment was related to one or more products, select "Yes".  Y VARCHAR 2 28 Field Name Field Description  Sample Data  Data Type  Format  Max
